languages.text: "В прошении отказано. Машинный дух почтенного мастер-когитатора Йота-IIIB постигла хворь. Неавторизированные пытки ее усугубят и помешают врачеванию. Я не допущу подобных изуверств над великим старцем!"

"Petition rejected. A malady has befallen the machine spirit of the honoured master cogitator Iota-IIIB. Unauthorised anguish will worsen its condition and impede treatment. I will not stand for such acts of brutality against the great elder!"
languages.original_text: "В прошении отказано. Машинный дух почтенного мастер-когитатора Йота-IIIB постигла хворь. Неавторизированные пытки ее усугубят и помешают врачеванию. Я не допущу подобных изуверств над великим старцем!"

"Petition rejected. A malady has befallen the machine spirit of the honoured master cogitator Iota-IIIB. Unauthorised anguish will worsen its condition and impede treatment. I will not stand for such acts of brutality against the great elder!"

"Petition rejected. A malady has befallen the machine spirit of the honoured master cogitator Iota-IIIB. Unauthorised anguish will worsen its condition and impede treatment. I will not stand for such acts of brutality against the great elder!"

languages.text: « Demande rejetée. L'esprit de la machine du vénérable maître-cogitateur Iota-IIIB est souffrant. Un facteur de stress superflu ne ferait qu'aggraver son état et compromettre ses chances de guérison. Je ne peux tolérer de tels actes de violence à l'encontre du grand ancien ! »
languages.original_text: "Petition rejected. A malady has befallen the machine spirit of the honoured master cogitator Iota-IIIB. Unauthorised anguish will worsen its condition and impede treatment. I will not stand for such acts of brutality against the great elder!"

traits.locale_text: « Demande rejetée. L'esprit de la machine du vénérable maître-cogitateur Iota-IIIB est souffrant. Un facteur de stress superflu ne ferait qu'aggraver son état et compromettre ses chances de guérison. Je ne peux tolérer de tels actes de violence à l'encontre du grand ancien ! »

languages.text: «Petición rechazada. El espíritu máquina del honorable cogitador maestro Iota-IIIB sufre una aflicción. Forzarlo de forma no autorizada empeorará su estado e interferirá con su tratamiento. ¡No toleraré ningún acto de brutalidad contra el venerable anciano!».
languages.original_text: "Petition rejected. A malady has befallen the machine spirit of the honoured master cogitator Iota-IIIB. Unauthorised anguish will worsen its condition and impede treatment. I will not stand for such acts of brutality against the great elder!"

traits.locale_text: «Petición rechazada. El espíritu máquina del honorable cogitador maestro Iota-IIIB sufre una aflicción. Forzarlo de forma no autorizada empeorará su estado e interferirá con su tratamiento. ¡No toleraré ningún acto de brutalidad contra el venerable anciano!».

languages.text: “请求已拒绝，某种疾病感染了主工作日志沉思者“伊欧塔-IIIB”的机魂，未经批准的痛苦折磨会让机魂的病情恶化，阻碍治疗。我决不会容忍这种伤害伟大长者的暴行！”
languages.original_text: "Petition rejected. A malady has befallen the machine spirit of the honoured master cogitator Iota-IIIB. Unauthorised anguish will worsen its condition and impede treatment. I will not stand for such acts of brutality against the great elder!"

traits.locale_text: “请求已拒绝，某种疾病感染了主工作日志沉思者“伊欧塔-IIIB”的机魂，未经批准的痛苦折磨会让机魂的病情恶化，阻碍治疗。我决不会容忍这种伤害伟大长者的暴行！”

languages.text: 「嘆願書が却下されました。名誉あるマスター・コジテーターの機械精霊Iota-IIIBに病魔が降りかかりました。無許可の苦痛は病状を悪化させ、治療の妨げとなります。偉大なる長老に対する残忍行為を許すわけにはいきません！」
languages.original_text: "Petition rejected. A malady has befallen the machine spirit of the honoured master cogitator Iota-IIIB. Unauthorised anguish will worsen its condition and impede treatment. I will not stand for such acts of brutality against the great elder!"

traits.locale_text: 「嘆願書が却下されました。名誉あるマスター・コジテーターの機械精霊Iota-IIIBに病魔が降りかかりました。無許可の苦痛は病状を悪化させ、治療の妨げとなります。偉大なる長老に対する残忍行為を許すわけにはいきません！」

languages.text: "Antrag abgewiesen. Ein Leiden hat den Maschinengeist des ehrenwerten Meister-Cogitators Iota-IIIB befallen. Unbefugte Pein wird seinen Zustand verschlechtern und die Behandlung behindern. Ich dulde keine derartige Brutalität gegen den ehrwürdigen Alten!"
languages.original_text: "Petition rejected. A malady has befallen the machine spirit of the honoured master cogitator Iota-IIIB. Unauthorised anguish will worsen its condition and impede treatment. I will not stand for such acts of brutality against the great elder!"

traits.locale_text: "Antrag abgewiesen. Ein Leiden hat den Maschinengeist des ehrenwerten Meister-Cogitators Iota-IIIB befallen. Unbefugte Pein wird seinen Zustand verschlechtern und die Behandlung behindern. Ich dulde keine derartige Brutalität gegen den ehrwürdigen Alten!"

languages.text: "İstirham reddedildi. Onurlu ana kavramsayar İota-IIIB'nin makine ruhuna bir illet musallat oldu. İzinsiz sıkıntı çekmesi, durumunu kötüleştirip tedaviye sekte vuracaktır. Yüce büyüğümüze karşı böylesi gaddar eylemlere müsaade edemem!"
languages.original_text: "Petition rejected. A malady has befallen the machine spirit of the honoured master cogitator Iota-IIIB. Unauthorised anguish will worsen its condition and impede treatment. I will not stand for such acts of brutality against the great elder!"
